main event: A questionnaire from a Project Blue Book document related to a UFO sighting with instructions on estimating speed and distance of the observed object.
interesting points: The estimated speed of the object was between 2,000 - 3,000 ft/hr., The object was reported to be about 1/4 mile away at the time of sighting., Witness was asked to describe the location of the sighting and if they were moving in a vehicle., The report included sketches for the witness to illustrate the height and path of the object., Another section sought previously experienced sightings to gather comparative data.
